name: Cozumel Highlights By Truck And Boat
description: Your adventure begins upon arrival to Cozumel Island, home to the second largest coral reefs in the world. Hop on to your private boat and enjoy the ride through caribbean turquoise waters on your way to nearby coral reefs. Jump into Cozumels' pristine underwater world and observe the variety of colorful fish surround you. After your refreshing snorkel tour make sure you buckle your seatbelts on our Safari type bus as you travel around the island.
